channel.title: LUPM - Cloud Compute on France Grilles Cloud Status

item.title: LUPM Maintenance
item.description: Description: The LUPM site will be down from the 2nd of August until the 10th of September, due to a scheduled network outage.
item.content: Description: The LUPM site will be down from the 2nd of August until the 10th of September, due to a scheduled network outage.
